reviews.review: 爽，但唯一不爽的是，为什么我的画面比商店截图烂那么多，750ti不至于啊（可能是兼容的问题，经常自动退游戏）

It has a very nice story and the game concept is very unique. Try it out!

Even better than the first! New additions such as lasers and aerial faith plates make the already fun and unique gameplay even better! Wheatley is an amazing new character to Portal. And of course, the co-op test chambers are great fun to play with your friends! Once you've completed the single-player story and all the co-op tests, you can play other people's tests as well as create some of your own!

Es el segundo mejor juego que he jugado hasta ahora (el primero es Halo 2), sin duda tiene una buena historia, y sin hablar de GLaDOS porque como personaje uff es fantástica, un juego altamente recomendable sin duda.

Portal 2 is the excellent sequel to Portal, a game that is so important to videogame history that it was at the same time cherished by the game community for it's innovative gameplay, used in classrooms as an educational tool and featured in art exhibitions for its narrative.

Portal 2 is a first-person action puzzle that has incredible gameplay, amazing atmosphere and very good writing. It makes you feel terrible, like the first one did, and gives you a glance of how disturbed AI might think. 

The dark humor offers a critique of capitalism and techno-scientific domination. Since the game puzzles envolve physics, gravity and out of the box thinking, it is perfect for learning. The editor tools makes it possible to explore level design as a educational experience. The multiplayer mode gives you a whole new kind of cooperative experience.

While some may find Portal 1 to be better, others may consider it as a prototype for what Portal 2 is: a first-person with a memorable story, setting and characters that is only comparable to Bioshock.

In conclusion: One of the greatest games in videogame history.

Bu oyunu gerçekten taktir ettim. Oyun çok güzel. İlk oyundan bu yana çok şey değişmiş. Herşey modernleşmiş ve yeni hikayeler eklenmiş. Oyunun geçmişine dair birçok şey öğreniyoruz. Gelmiş geçmiş en iyi oyunlardan biri. 3.sünüde isterdik ama gelmesi pek mümkün değil. Kesinlikle tavsiye ediyorum. Ana oyun ve modları sonra doğru çok zorlaşıyor.

fun game especially the story line and it is amazing on how one simple game that was supposed to be an extra for the orange box game bundle had the potential to become a widely known and loved game series with community made mods and test chambers whith the p.t.i. (Perpetual Testing Initiative(test chamber creator))

[h1]Pro[/h1]
[list][*][b]Story[/b]
Die Story war wirklich gut und verdammt lustig. Ich hätte nicht erwartet, dass ein Rätselspiel wie dieses eine so krasse Story besitzt.
[*][b]Charaktere[/b]
Die Charaktere sind richtig witzig gestaltet. Einer will dir helfen, ein Anderer beleidigt dich durchweg,... .
[*] [b]Spielwelt[/b]
Die Level sind sehr schön designed und abwechslungsreich. Teilweise sind die Level etwas knifflig und manchmal kommt man auf die einfachste Lösung nicht (so ging es mir zumindest manchmal).
[*][b]Grafik[/b]
Die Grafik ist wirklich gut. Sehr cool fand ich auch, dass wenn man durch ein Portal geschaut hat, dass man gesehen hat, was vor dem anderen Portal liegt.
[*][b]CO-OP[/b]
Hierbei hab ich keine Elemente des Einzelspielers vermisst. Die Level waren knifflig und man musste auch wirklich gut zusammenarbeiten, sonst hat das nicht funktioniert. Einen Charakterer aus dem Einzelspieler musste man auch nicht missen. Man wird durchweg runtergemacht.
[/list]
[h1]Con[/h1]
[list][*]
[/list]
[h1]Zusammenfassung[/h1]
Ich finde "Portal 2" ein wirklich gut gelungenes Spiel. Es war knifflig und man musste gut überlegen wie man manche Level angeht. Zwischen drin, hab ich mich zumindest, öfters mal tot gelacht, weil die Beleidigungen eines Charakteres einfach nur viel zu gut waren. Ich kann dieses Spiel nur empfehlen.

Play it if you didnt do it yet.
But beware you will be addicted.

花了一天一线冲关。终章射击月球时有种震撼的感觉（乡野村夫，没上过月球，见识短莫笑）之后的机器人类似八音盒的大合奏以及Glados的吟唱都非常好

场景特效作为老游戏来说非常不错了（作为一个渣机用户耍不起3A也就只能打打这些过气游戏。。）

[spoiler]中段章节个人有所卡关，加上视角的切换及场景的高速变化在反复重试下我终于忍不住吐了。。[/spoiler]

话痨核心Wheathey我其实很喜欢的（作为一个比较沉默的人更善于倾听；终章时，哪怕Wheathey反复试图杀死我我也在想办法走其他路线，后来实在无果不得已放弃）

[strike]这个游戏其实讲得是得到力量失控的人工智能企图毁灭人类最终被主角阻止的故事（我知道我在扯淡，其实讲的根本不是这意思）[/strike]

[spoiler]另：之所以会入手这游戏是因为合出了90%打折券-[/spoiler]

Одна из лучших игр в Steam. Великолепные монологи ГЛаДОС, довольно простые, но интересные головоломки и просто потрясающий коопреативный режим. Прохождение одиночной кампании занимает всего часов 8-9, но благодаря наличию нескольких тысяч коопреативных и сингловых карт, которые можно бесплатно скачать из мастерской, удовольствие от игры можно растянуть на десятки, а то и на сотни часов. В общем, Portal 2 однозначно обязателен для приобретения. 12/10!

I finished Portal in two days (one late night, one early morning). As someone who has rarely played anything that isn't an MMORPG or Minecraft, it was overwhelmingly awesome. I'd never come across a game that managed to combine an amazing story arc, awesome graphics, first-person shooter mechanics, AND puzzle levels successfully. Not to mention the totally epic boss battle.
Usually I don't expect too much from sequels, but, based on the awesomeness of the first game and the good things I'd heard about the second one, I had some relatively high expectations of Portal 2. Let me just say that any preconceptions I'd had were blown away.
Maybe I'm not the hardest person to please where games are concerned, but, for all intents and purposes, Portal 2 is the bomb. 
Although it had far less cake than the first Portal, the humor was just as good, if not better. I loved the way the tutorial blended perfectly into the storyline of the game without seeming completely invisible. The graphics (which I thought were good in the first Portal) were some of the best I've ever seen. The atmosphere was incredible, even though it changed rapidly; this game has so many moods and settings, from the verdant, overgrown beginning, to the empty, haunted ruins of the old Aperture facility, and finally to the smooth but jilted, futuristic-but-half-destroyed world of Wheatley Laboratories. (Was that a spoiler? Sorry!) The voice acting was perfect; it's a challenge to make two robots convey emotion with limited or no facial expressions, but somehow, Valve's writers did it.
The gameplay was great. Although the tests all consisted of the same mechanics and elements, they were all so different that they didn't seem repetitive at all. Ingame, it ran very smoothly, although it crashed a couple of times when I tried to minimize it. 
And then... the story. Ooooh, boy. 
What I considered the first Portal's story was more a combination of rich history and a great climax (if you don't count the unseen Doug Rattmann's portion of the plot). This one, though, somehow managed to convey an amazingly rich story with only five characters (Chell, GLaDOS, Wheatley, Cave Johnson, and Caroline - does she even count as a separate character??), one of whom never even speaks. This game has so much heart and feeling, despite the austere, sterile environment.
The boss battle was just as good as the one in the first Portal, if even better. The new mechanics made it a hundred times better than it would have been otherwise. The ending to the first Portal game was poignant, if predictable, but the end of Portal 2 was unexpected, ingenious, and a huge tearjerker. (Hint: Stick around to the end of the credits. Not only is the song hilarious, but the post-credits scene makes the whole ending a thousand times better - or is that worse?)
So, bottom line. Would I recommend this game to a friend?
Heck, yes. I already have. She bought it, and we've spent hours playing the equally amazing co-op mode together.
If you've never played a Valve game, if you've never played a Portal game, if you've heard of it but never gotten around to buying it, if you've played the first Portal game, if you've seen a friend play both games, if you've watched playthroughs of Portal 2 and know everything about it... basically, if you like video games, buy this game. I swear, you won't regret it.

Do I want a Portal 3?
...I don't know. On one hand, another Portal game would never be a bad thing. On the other, this game left off in such a perfect spot... I don't know if I want it to be ruined.

Portal 2 ist meiner Meinung nach ein geniales Spiel. Man wird immer, ob alleine oder im Coop (welcher sowohl Online als auch im Splitscreen spielbar ist), gefordertet, die Rätsel sind weder zu leicht noch zu schwer und gelegentliche düstere Phasen werden durch einen trockenen Humor aufgelockert. Portal 2 bedient sich einem Konvolut an Grundelementen (z.B. Katapulte, Gels, Laser und natürlich Portale), kombiniert diese jedoch immer wieder neu, sodass nie der Eindruck von Eintönigkeit oder Langeweile entsteht. Ferner gibt es die Möglichkeit seiner Kreativität freien Lauf zu lassen und selbst Testkammern zu erstellen und diese mit anderen Spielern zu teilen.

Portal 2 gehört definitiv zu meinen Lieblingen.  Es macht einfach eine menge Spaß. Den Singleplayermodus habe ich bereits mehrfach durchgespielt ohne das es je langweilig geworden ist. Das Spiel hat einiges zu bieten. Von einer fesselnden Story über einige Eastereggs bis hin zu einem lokalen und einem Online Koop-Modus sowie einen kinderleicht bedienbaren Level-Editor mit dem man im Nullkommanichts seine eigenen Level gestalten und mit seinen Freunden oder der gesamten Community teilen kann. Das Spiel läuft (zumindest in meinen Fall) flüssig und fehlerfrei unter Windows 7/10 und auch unter Ubuntu. Ebenfalls sehr schön finde ich das sowohl das Source SDK als auch der Source Filmmaker jedem kostenfrei zur verfügung steht. So kann, dank einer großen Onlinecommunity und jeder Menge Tutorials, jeder versierte Nutzer mit etwas Geduld und Übung eigene Mods schreiben, Maps erstellen, einen kleinen Animationsfilm erstellen und noch vieles mehr.

Am besten macht ihr euch euer eigenes Bild in dem ihr es selbst spielt. 

Und jetzt [u] kauft es euch [/u]
Viel Spaß beim spielen!

Place a Portal here then place...wait have i said this before? This game picks off perfectly after the last portal. Portal 2 feels fantastic with a great improvement on graphics gameplay and somehow even better dialog. the characters feel lively and the new mechanics don't feel forced and fit right in with the last games feel. blending new and old perfectly with great multiplayer chaos and a co-op mode that has you coming back. community support that adds more and more to play and when the story ends your challenge truly begins with all that content to explore from the community. I Highly recommend this game to anyone who enjoys puzzles and especially any fan of the first game. Portal 2 is an easy 10/10 and now i just want portal 3.

解谜是这款游戏最大的亮点，也是我最喜欢的地方，谜题有难度但解谜方式多种多样(还好解谜不限时，不然我永远过不了，某玩家一脸悲壮地说道)，给玩家较大的自由发挥的空间。值得一提的是游戏的剧情也是非常不错的，虽然大部分时间都是在不停地旋转跳跃(或许我闭着眼就不会感觉头晕了)，但是随着剧情的一点点地深入，你会为之惊叹。

Познакомился с portal 2 ещё летом 2014 года. Тогда для меня все было там сложно и непонятно и проходил с помощью ютуба. Сейчас купил не помнил не единой камеры кроме 1 из одиночки которую гладос называла творением нобелевских лауреатов и ещё 1 из кооператива. Тогда я портал прошёл часов за 30-35+ кооператив 20-25ч. Тут прошёл часов максимум за 10 и остался доволен. Игра очень хорошая разогреть мозга как раз то что надо, вальв делает отличные игры и позиционирует их как инновационными. Все так и есть

For fans of Portal 1: The improved story and increased length of Portal 2 are both massive plusses. However, there seems to be a decided dumbing down of the puzzles. Loads of cool new elements are introduced to gameplay, and you'll have moments of pleasure messing around with them, but almost *every* single puzzle boils down like this:

You're in a room covered in non-portal walls
There is one spot suspiciously portalable

It happens over and over and OVER again. In portal 1 each room was a bit more open and it meant there were even multiple solutions to each puzzle. Portal 2 just feels like a game of "Find the one spot I can chuck a portal". Nevertheless, the setting is incredible and the game does its predecessor justice.

Amazing.

'Nuff said.

[b][u]Portal 2[/u] est selon moi un excellent jeu![/b]
Du début jusqu’à la fin, c’était toujours des niveaux variés et différents, mais surtout drôles et amusants. Le mode Coop est très plaisant avec un ami et est quand même assez long. J’ai trouvé que tous les niveaux sont bien balancés, même si parfois, il faut chercher plus en profondeur pour les réussir. Les graphiques sont très jolis et l’histoire de ce jeu est très bien pensée. De plus, le Workshop vous offre une infinité de nouveaux niveaux à accomplir. Bref, un jeu complet à 100%!
Este Jogo sim coloca seu cérebro para funcionar, muito bom zerei 2x, recomendo nota 11/10
Oyun tek kelimeyle efsanevi .

优点：
玩法：非常有创意，两道传送门足以上天入地。（室外关卡常常能体验从天而降和一飞冲天，爽！）

人物：哑巴主角，担任剧情解说的是两个机器人惠特利和格拉多斯。配音和台词亮点多多，惠特利的贫嘴和格拉多斯的毒舌让我哭笑不得，特别是变成大土豆的格拉多斯一本正经地威胁玩家和惠特利真是很好笑。这两个机器人让《传送门2》成为了一款非常欢乐的解谜游戏。结尾格拉多斯演唱的歌曲也是非常有趣。

画面：室内场景主要由蓝，白，橙三色构成，非常有简洁的科幻感。室外的场景显得破烂，但纵深感非常强烈，尤其是那些几十米高的镂空地板，我承认往下看的时候真的被吓到了。 氛围压抑但不恐怖，你不用担心会被巨大的怪兽追逐或是在黑暗中突然窜出什么吓至心脏病发。你所要做的，就是努力思考，怎么解谜、怎么利用箱子和凝胶等各种道具、怎么设置传送门以到达终点。游戏的大部分时间都是十分舒服的，当然有一些剧情需要的地方要主角拼命逃命时，代入感也是十足。

关卡：难度恰到好处，室外关卡难度比室内大。你觉得无聊是因为不知道怎么走，你觉得抓狂是因为知道怎么走了但操作步骤点错了要重来一遍。

不足：
1.单人流程比较短。

2.室外有些场景由于建筑物的遮挡不容易找到终点的位置，我觉得应该设置一个提示，让终点处更加显眼。

注意：3D眩晕的玩家请勿在饭后体验此作。:-D
今までやったゲームの中で一番楽しかった

如果你有玩過一代，那就更應該玩二代了！
更多的機關、更多的謎題、更多一代沒透露的背景細節，都可以在這裡獲得滿足。
再說，這次的嘴砲角色從一個變成三個了，超棒的不是嗎？
就算蛋糕是謊言，超棒的夥伴方塊跟機槍塔會在一路上陪伴著你的～
好遊戲，不玩嗎？
Harika Bir Oyun Yani Daha Bişey Söyleyebilirmiyim Bilmiyorum
Отличная игра.
